content:
# The error indicates that I cannot craft the stone furnace because the game requires me to gather the intermediate resource, stone, first.
# This means I need to ensure I have the required stones in my inventory before attempting to craft the stone furnace.

# Since I already have 1610 stones in my inventory, I need to ensure I am using them correctly.
# I will check the recipe for the stone furnace to confirm the required materials.

# After confirming the recipe, I will proceed to craft the stone furnace again.
recipe = get_prototype_recipe(Prototype.StoneFurnace)  # Get the recipe for the stone furnace to verify requirements.
